entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nested 'for' semantic snippet fails to simplify global::System.Int32 to int #71542

Closed

  • Source generator does not produce the same result when compiled with dotnet or Visual Studio 2022 #71538
  • Collection expressions: conversion error reported for spread of `dynamic` type #69704
    17.9
  • Complete statement - fix semicolon placement on For statement initializer with missing semicolon #32250
    Next
  • Typing a semicolon inside a broken string in a parameter list inserts semicolon at the end of the method call #49929
    Next
  • Complete statement command enhancement #52299
    Next
  • Semantic snippets: postfix inline statement snippets are not shown if the next statement starts with a contextual keyword treated as identifier #69598
    17.8 P4
  • MSBuildWorkspaceLoader cannot access binlog (regression in dotnet/format tests) #70674
    17.9 P2
  • IDE0220 on foreach (Match m in regex.Matches) – Should Not Occur #63470
  • Unexpected error message from collection expression cast #71490
    17.10
  • Caret jumps to end of line when i type semicolon #37792
    Backlog
  • CS8509 Doesn't flag nullable enums correctly #71508
    Backlog
  • The type name 'Empty' does not exist in the type 'Guid' #71504
  • Short circuiting operations incorrectly converted to non-short circuiting version when reading from a ref #71487

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ILVerify bits #71544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix unwrapping of null synchronization context during xunit test execution #71541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Address UIDelays in AbstractGraphProvider.GetCommands #71540
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [PR VALIDATION] extend live table data source #71539
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support generic attributes in Attribute suffix simplification #71534
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Doc comment id cleanup #71533
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` method parameter conversion #71531
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters

Merged

  • Fix issue where we were not offering 'use collection expression' in a nullable scenario. #71528
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Params Collections - Adjust binding in presence of dynamic arguments #71421
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71543
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve Complete Statement behavior inside collection initializers and strings #71536
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71256
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Semantic snippets: fix inline statement snippets in a "qualified name" edge case #71246
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary WpfFact usage #71517
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Update publishdata.json for VS snap #71537
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: report specific error (if any) for explicit cast failure #71492
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • README links #71535
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update other BCL to 8.0.0 #71516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to 8.0 #71507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve parsing performance with large collection expressions of numbers #71443
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move TestWorkspace to Workspace test layer, add EditorTestWorkspace to EditorFeatures layer #71407
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Use IHotReloadLogger service to log message whenever EnC is disabled #71385
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add error logging to RequestContext #71366
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't hard select promoted default item if there's filter text #71480
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Move editor-dependent tests to EditorFeatures #71518
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove string.Split calls during solution explorer search #71520
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
